sound_translation: And their Lord will give them a pure drink.
translation: And their Lord will give them a pure drink.

sound_translation: In the name of Allah and with blessing of Allah I begin (eating).
translation: In the name of Allah and with blessing of Allah I begin (eating).

sound_dua: الْحَمْدُ لِلّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا وَجَعَلَنَا مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِينْ
dua: الْحَمْدُ لِلّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا وَجَعَلَنَا مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِينْ
sound_translation: All praise is due to Allah who has given us food and drink and made us Muslims.
translation: All praise is due to Allah who has given us food and drink and made us Muslims.

sound_translation: O Allah, with Your name I die and I live.
translation: O Allah, with Your name I die and I live.

sound_translation: My Lord! Increase me in knowledge.
translation: My Lord! Increase me in knowledge.

sound_dua: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ، وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِالله
dua: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ، وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِالله
sound_translation: In the Name of Allah, I have placed my trust in Allah; there is no might and no power except by Allah.
translation: In the Name of Allah, I have placed my trust in Allah; there is no might and no power except by Allah.

sound_dua: الْحَمْدُ لِلّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورْ
dua: الْحَمْدُ لِلّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورْ
sound_translation: All praise belongs to Allah Who has restored us back to life after causing us to die; and to Him shall we return.
translation: All praise belongs to Allah Who has restored us back to life after causing us to die; and to Him shall we return.
